page.title: 18EFFECTS OF THE RECESSION
page.content: The closing of all the numerous,local, lead works,collieries,some local shops the paper mill,Courtaulds at Flint has had a devasting effect on Bagillt.This and no new jobs being created in the area has had a depressing effect on the local population.A very high percentage of the local inhabitants are unemployed and have been for some considerable time.Because of their age they are unlikely to secure employment.Many families do not travel very far afield due to the expense involved.Using public transport is too expensive.They can not afford to run their own car.Some belong to large families.Many local people feel quite depressed at such prospects.A considerable time is spent watching television and socialising in the local public houses.Many attend Bingo 2/3 times a week locally.
